snippet: Varian Fry and Ernst Hanfstaengl’s 1935 encounter and their actions during World War II spurred Richard Kaplan to tackle their lives and histories in the film “Varian and Putzi.”
lead_paragraph: Varian Fry and Ernst Hanfstaengl’s 1935 encounter and their actions during World War II spurred Richard Kaplan to tackle their lives and histories in the film “Varian and Putzi.”

headline.main: Horrors of a Coming War Painted in a 1935 Meeting
headline.seo: ‘Varian and Putzi: A 20th Century Tale’ — Review
headline.print_headline: Horrors of a Coming War Painted in a 1935 Meeting
